subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Amazing.
author: Lisby
full_text:
Frank, dearest (I typed "deadrest" first), I was about to ask you  
what you are up to with the TV sweep because I was away for a month  
and have obviously got a lot to catch up on.  So, please tell me what  
you're doing with this. Please show me the pictures you mention, too,  
because otherwise I can't tell you if they're a sitcom, not the Other  
Side.

;)

Ann

On Sep 20, 2007, at 9:43 AM, Frank Sumption wrote:

>
>  The same old shiesola. Post stuff that should draw comments and  
> discussions, like the pictures posted last night, but no, the  
> discussion is on how dishonest some pro psyhic is, and how foolish  
> I am to watch her on Montel's show.
>
>  I did a second test with the larger TV, and got images that were  
> like full size, some larger than the screen, they look like  
> portraits, but now I think the group in not the place present them.  
> Most would prefer to discuss some trivial POS, or some whispery  
> noise that just has to be a voice if it can just be filtered  
> enough! Y'all wonder why I get fed up and quit the damn group! God  
> Almighty!!
>
>
> Frank-S
>
>
>
>
> More photos; more messages; more whatever – Get MORE with Windows  
> Live™ Hotmail®. NOW with 5GB storage. Get more!
>
>
